channel.title: regression on Blogs of Kai
channel.description: Recent content in regression on Blogs of Kai

item.title: The memory of expected value and variance
item.description: Reviewing the basic statistical concepts: expected value and variance.

item.title: Regression analysis: How do I interpret R-squared and assess the Goodness-of-Fit?
item.description: Low R-squared values are not always bad and high R-squared values are not always good!

item.title: How to Interpret a Regression Model with Low R-squared and Low P values
item.description: What if your regression model has significant variables but explains little of the variability? With low P values and a low R-squared.
